SEARCH
Package org.apache.avro.reflect

Annotation Type AvroAlias

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target({TYPE,FIELD}) @Repeatable(AvroAliases.class) public @interface AvroAlias
Adds the given name and space as an alias to the schema. Avro files of this schema can be read into classes named by the alias.
